creator: Ryan.Lubke@Sun.COM
text:
JSP.8.3 states:

"....If the tag accets dynamic attributes, then page-scoped variables must
 also be made available for each dynamic attribute passed it."

However, when checking the page context local to the Tag file, the attribute
cannot be found.

creator: jan.luehe@sun.com
text:
Dynamic attributes are no longer exposed individually as page-scoped attributes.
Instead, they're stored in a Map (named for the value of the
'dynamic-attributes' tag directive attribute), which is exposed.

JSP 2.0 spec lead confirmed that the quote from JSP.8.3 in the bug description
is no longer current, and will be removed from the spec.
